project.heading: Darwin
project.htmlContent: Darwin is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) backend service that build to improve question-answering capabilities by integrating external knowledge sources such as databases, cloud storage, and document files. The project involves creating a data pipeline where information from various sources is extracted, preprocessed, and converted into vector embeddings using state-of-the-art models. These embeddings are stored in a specialized vector database, enabling efficient similarity searches. When a user submits a question, the system retrieves relevant data from the database, combines it with a generative model, and produces contextually accurate and insightful answers. This approach enhances the systemâ€™s ability to respond dynamically, leveraging both static knowledge and real-time external data.
